amendatorysection.catchline: Engaging in chemigation with a suspended or revoked permit; penalty.
amendatorysection.para: Any person who engages in chemigation with a suspended or revoked chemigation permit shall be (1) subject to a civil penalty of not more than one thousand dollars or (2) guilty of a Class II misdemeanor. Each day of continued violation shall constitute a separate offense. The court may issue such injunctive orders as may be necessary to prohibit continued violations of the Nebraska Chemigation Act.
